revised_title: Synthesis and Properties of New Organo-Tin Compounds
tldr: The authors describe the synthesis and properties of a new class of organotin compounds containing halogens. They prepare and characterize various derivatives, including methylstanniodoform, methylstannoxylic acid, methylstannibromoform, and methylstannichloroform. The reactions and properties of these compounds are discussed, providing insights into the chemistry of organotin compounds.
